<!-- installing libraries -->

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(maps)
library(tidyverse)
library(vdemdata)
library(ggplot2)
library(gganimate)
```

<!-- dataset -->

```{r, message=FALSE}
vdemfull <- vdemdata::vdem
onlycountries <- vdemfull[-c(25990:27555), ]

map <- map_data("world")
map$region[map$region == "USA"] = "United States of America"
map$region[map$region == "UK"] = "United Kingdom"
map$region[map$region == "Czech Republic"] = "Czechia"
```

<!-- womens empowerment variables -->

```{r}
allwemp <- onlycountries %>% select(region = country_name, abbr = country_text_id, id = country_id, year = year, wpei = v2x_gender, liberties = v2x_gencl, society = v2x_gencs, participation = v2x_genpp)
wemp100yr <- filter(allwemp, year >= 1900, year <= 2001)
mapwemp100yr <- left_join(wemp100yr, map, by = "region")
```

<!-- voting rights -->

```{r}
allvoting <- onlycountries %>% select(region = country_name, abbr = country_text_id, id = country_id, year = year, voting = v2fsuffrage)
voting100yr <- filter(allvoting, year >1899, year <2001)
mapvoting100yr <- left_join(voting100yr, map, by = "region")
```


<!-- creating a csv file of cleaned data -->

```{r}
#write.csv(wemp100yr, 'wemp100yr.csv')

```

<!-- suffrage maps -->

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
vote1900 <- filter(mapvoting100yr, year == 1900)
actualvote1900<-filter(vote1900, voting > 0)
vote1925 <- filter(mapvoting100yr, year == 1925)
actualvote1925<-filter(vote1925, voting > 0)
vote1950 <- filter(mapvoting100yr, year == 1950)
actualvote1950<-filter(vote1950, voting > 0)
vote1975 <- filter(mapvoting100yr, year == 1975)
actualvote1975<-filter(vote1975, voting > 0)
vote2000 <- filter(mapvoting100yr, year == 2000)
actualvote2000<-filter(vote2000, voting > 0)
#basemap
basemap <- ggplot() + geom_map(data = map, map = map, aes(long, lat, map_id = region))
#1900 map
basemap + geom_map(data = actualvote1900, map = vote1900, aes(long, lat, map_id = region), fill="purple")
#1925 map
basemap + geom_map(data = actualvote1925, map = vote1925, aes(long, lat, map_id = region), fill="purple")
#1950 map
basemap + geom_map(data = actualvote1950, map = vote1950, aes(long, lat, map_id = region), fill = "purple")
#1975 map
basemap + geom_map(data = actualvote1975, map = vote1975, aes(long, lat, map_id = region), fill="purple")
#2000 map
basemap + geom_map(data = actualvote2000, map = vote2000, aes(long, lat, map_id = region), fill = "purple")
```

<!-- wpei maps -->

```{r message=False, warning=FALSE}
wemp1900 <- filter(mapwemp100yr, year == 1900)
wemp1925 <- filter(mapwemp100yr, year == 1925)
wemp1950 <- filter(mapwemp100yr, year == 1950)
wemp1975 <- filter(mapwemp100yr, year == 1975)
wemp2000 <- filter(mapwemp100yr, year == 2000)
#basemap
basemap <- ggplot() + geom_map(data = map, map = map, aes(long, lat, map_id = region)) + scale_fill_gradient(low = "yellow", high = "pink")
#1900 map
basemap + geom_map(data = wemp1900, map = wemp1900, aes(fill = wpei, map_id = region))
#1925 map
basemap + geom_map(data = wemp1925, map = wemp1925, aes(fill = wpei, map_id = region))
#1950 map
basemap + geom_map(data = wemp1950, map = wemp1950, aes(fill = wpei, map_id = region))
#1975 map
basemap + geom_map(data = wemp1975, map = wemp1975, aes(fill = wpei, map_id = region))
#2000 map
basemap + geom_map(data = wemp2000, map = wemp2000, aes(fill = wpei, map_id = region))
```

<!-- category breakup -->
```{r}
quantiles <- quantile(wemp100yr$wpei, probs = c(1/4, 2/4, 3/4), na.rm = TRUE)
quantiles
mapwemp100yr[, 'category'] = NA 
mapwemp100yr[, 'categoryvalue'] = NA

#categories: nascent wpei < 0.188 emerging 0.188 < wpei < 0.336 developing  0.336 < wpei < 0.546 established wpei > 0.546
mapwemp100yr$category <- as.factor(ifelse(mapwemp100yr$wpei<0.188, 'nascent',
                                  ifelse(mapwemp100yr$wpei>0.188 & mapwemp100yr$wpei<0.336, 'emerging',
                                    ifelse(mapwemp100yr$wpei>0.336 & mapwemp100yr$wpei<0.546, 'developing',
                                    ifelse(mapwemp100yr$wpei>0.546, 'established', 'none')))))
mapwemp100yr$categoryvalue <- as.numeric(ifelse(mapwemp100yr$wpei<0.188, 1,
                                    ifelse(mapwemp100yr$wpei>0.188 & mapwemp100yr$wpei<0.336, 2,
                                    ifelse(mapwemp100yr$wpei>0.336 & mapwemp100yr$wpei<0.546, 3,
                                    ifelse(mapwemp100yr$wpei>0.546, 4, 0)))))
summary(mapwemp100yr)

```
<!-- category maps -->
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
catwemp1900 <- filter(mapwemp100yr, year == 1900)
catwemp1925 <- filter(mapwemp100yr, year == 1925)
catwemp1950 <- filter(mapwemp100yr, year == 1950)
catwemp1975 <- filter(mapwemp100yr, year == 1975)
catwemp2000 <- filter(mapwemp100yr, year == 2000)
#basemap
basemap <- ggplot() + geom_map(data = map, map = map, aes(long, lat, map_id = region)) + scale_fill_gradient( low = "yellow", high = "red")
#1900 map
basemap + geom_map(data = catwemp1900, map = catwemp1900, aes(fill = categoryvalue, map_id = region))
#1925 map
basemap + geom_map(data = catwemp1925, map = catwemp1925, aes(fill = categoryvalue, map_id = region))
#1950 map
basemap + geom_map(data = catwemp1950, map = catwemp1950, aes(fill = categoryvalue, map_id = region))
#1975 map
basemap + geom_map(data = catwemp1975, map = catwemp1975, aes(fill = categoryvalue, map_id = region))
#2000 map
basemap + geom_map(data = catwemp2000, map = catwemp2000, aes(fill = categoryvalue, map_id = region))
```

<!-- finding transition periods -->
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
wemp100yr[, 'category'] = NA 
wemp100yr[, 'categoryvalue'] = NA

#categories: nascent wpei < 0.188 emerging 0.188 < wpei < 0.336 developing  0.336 < wpei < 0.546 established wpei > 0.546
wemp100yr$category <- as.factor(ifelse(wemp100yr$wpei<0.188, 'nascent',
                                  ifelse(wemp100yr$wpei>0.188 & wemp100yr$wpei<0.336, 'emerging',
                                    ifelse(wemp100yr$wpei>0.336 & wemp100yr$wpei<0.546, 'developing',
                                    ifelse(wemp100yr$wpei>0.546, 'established', 'none')))))
wemp1900s <- filter(wemp100yr, year < 1910)
summary(wemp1900s)
wemp1910s <- filter(wemp100yr, year < 1920)
summary(wemp1910s)
summary(wemp100yr$category)
#potential periods: nascent 1900 - 1934  emerging 1934 - 1957 developing 1957 - 1973 established 1973 - 2000
```
